ENGLISH: Find the origin of the aggressive crystalline vine growth.
Destroy the origin of the aggressive crystalline vine growth.

First sighted together with emergence of Flurian Omega strain in Metal Valley, Alien Energy Artillery is a downscaled version of its progenitor. What makes the variant extremely dangerous is its ability to spawn octabits on projectile impact.

Emerging at almost the same time as Alien Energy Artillery, the Alien Energy Plasma Tower is a downscaled variant of existing Alien Plasma Tower. It is theorized that someone or something developed the war form for rapid field deployments.

An intriguing war form that appeared with Flurian Omicron strain, Alien Kinetic Artillery resembles an oversized high caliber sniper weapon. While it's uncertain if the war form was a response to Riftbreaker or by chance, its lethality is certain.

A co-emergent to Flurian Omicron and Alien Kinetic Artillery strains, Alien Kinetic Mortar apparently evolved from Alien Plasma Tower to shoot suicidal war forms similar to Alien Energy Artillery albeit at shorter distances and higher rate of fire.

First sighted with spread of Omega-strain aliens outside of Metallic Valley, Baxmoth Omega is an incredibly dangerous self-regenerating specimen that is able to spawn special drones that can momentarily disable Riftbreaker euipment.
An unique strain observed to emerge at the same time as Flurian Omicron, Bradron Kinetic had apparently evolved rapid firing kinetic ejector that can pose a substantial threat to Riftbreaker armour.

Bradron Tesla is a rare sub-variant of Bradron Ultra where it mysteriously evolved a way to project electrical arcs that can hit multiple targets at once in front of the alien. It is suspected that the strain emerged as a response to Riftbreaker lightning weapons.

A curious variant of Arachnoids, Magma Arachnoids had evolved to live within harsh volcanic regions of Galatea 37. The variant is almost identical to Magmoths where they eat and secrete highly volatile thermal fluids.

Magma Bomogan is an unique variant of Bomogans whereby the sub-species apparently had co-evolved with Magma Arachnoids. Magma Bomogans are capable to launch special sacks containing molten rock. Worse still, upon Magma Bomogan's sack rupture multiple Morirots will emerge.
A rare and highly dangerous variant of Ultra Bomogans, Omega Bomogans had somehow evolved self-regeneration and special bio-sacks that can temporarily shut down Riftbreaker equipment on contact.
Through unknown means, this variant of Bomogans had apparently evolved a method to directly interfere with Riftbreaker technologies. It is best to engage them as quickly as possible.

Flurian Omega is a rare and powerful variant of Flurian Ultras whereby the sub-species had apparently evolved self-regeneration. Omega Flurians are almost indistinguishable from Ultra Flurians except their pattern colourations and ability to shoot energy grenades that can disrupt Riftbreaker technologies.

Flurian Omicron is an unique sub variant of Flurian Omega and no less deadly. The sub-species mysteriously lost its progenitor's ability to launch multiple energy grenades and instead able to launch special kinetic projectiles containing suicidal war forms. Extreme caution is advised.
Gnerot Omega is a curious evolution of Gnerot-strain in volcanic biome whereby it exhibit self-regeneration and ability to disable Riftbreaker technology on impact. Extreme caution is advised.

Through some unknown mechanism, the neutral Stonger fauna had evolved into Stonkr variant and incorporated some evolutionary features of Octabits. While Stonkr do not divide upon death, the creature is nonetheless deadly and have perchance of selectively attacking Riftbreaker defense towers in a suicidal charge.

By evolution or some other unknown mechanism, Vathamite in the wild were observed to evolve into deadlier, self-replicating Acidus strain. These creatures are intensely attracted to Riftbreaker energy emissions and would literally explode in shower of concentrated acid when they get close.

A rare variant of Zorant Ultra that can only be found deep within Galatea 37 desert regions, Zorant Hyper had somehow evolved a way to lob bio-energy sacks over short obstacles. While the reason behind this evolution is unclear, it is theorized that Zorants are actively adapting to Riftbreakers' incursions.

One of most dangerous variants of Zorants would be Zorant Super which had mysteriously grown a bio-energized ejector that is analogous to railgun technology employed by Riftbreakers. It is unknown on how such strain emerged, but one thing for certain Super Zorants necessitates extreme caution.

Through coincidence or convergent evolution, some Zorant Ultra were found to evolve into Omega strain that have self-regeneration. What makes them even more dangerous is their capability to shoot self-guided bio-projectiles that can disable Riftbreaker equipment.

A rare variant of Zorant Ultra, Zorant Omicron was found to have both evolutionary traits of Zorant Omega and Zorant Hyper through unknown means. Extreme caution is advised as Zorant Omicron have the capability to interfere with Riftbreaker equipment.

A rarely seen strain of Octabits, Octabit Omega species are markedly faster and have limited self-regeneration. Worryingly, the strain had somehow evolved to be able to disable Riftbreaker equipment on suicide.

Introduction of lightweight materials and compact ammunition allow creation of Burst Sentinel Towers.
Redesigned ammunition construction and firing assemblies enable greater damage output at range.
Advances in terminal ballistics and novel projectile design lead to higher damage efficiencies.
Variant of Sentinel Tower that uses a high caliber shotgun. Effective against small swarms.
An enlarged version of Shotgun Tower that priotizes on big targets.
A rotary cannon that fires fragmentation shells in short bursts. The tower have a slight firing delay for each firing cycle.
A multiple-shot tower equipped with linked large bore cannons that shoot fragmentary projectiles with limited penetration.
A tower equipped with large caliber cannon that can engage distant targets.
Development of novel propellants and compact assemblies allow creation of High Caliber Towers with large kinetic damage.
Refinement of ammunition assemblies and handling enable increased effectiveness of High Caliber Towers.
Improved ballistics and metallurgy allow higher stopping potential of High Caliber Towers.
Fires a burst of plasma with limited penetration to hit multiple targets in a short range.
Special plasma weapon system that fires slow-moving volatile plasma bolts which scatter on contact with enemies.
Fires barrage of plasmoids in a ballistic arc toward the target.
Modified laser Tower variant that fires electromagnetically-propelled liquid rock to target. Requires ironium to fire.
Breakthrough in high energy physics and novel semiconductors lead to creation of Advanced Energy Towers.
Newer conduits and energy capacitors allow increased reliability of Advanced Energy Towers.
Improved energy delivery systems enable more powerful and consistent performance of Advanced Energy Towers.
Specialized factory that produce munitions for Advanced Explosive Towers and Mr.Riggs. Requires radioactive gas to operate.
Shoots volleys of mini-rockets that fragment upon hitting targets.
Modified Artillery Tower capable of shooting multiple high explosive projectiles in short bursts. The tower have a firing delay for each firing cycle.
Upgraded version of Rocket Tower that fires long range missiles.
Special missile tower armed with multi-warhead long range missiles.
Capacity Increase - Cluster Cruise Missile Towers
Research into urano-titanium alloys allow creation of Advanced Explosive Towers which have greater explosive power than ordinary Artillery Towers.
Minaturization of bulky components enable greater warhead mass fractions for Advanced Explosive Towers.
Improved urano-titanium composite alloy geometries further boost damage output of payloads used in Advanced Explosive Towers.
Triggers lightning strike on target. Requires substantial amount of power per trigger.
Quantum processors and superconducting materials engineering allow creation of Rift Towers.
Reworked palladium superconducting spires and tanzanite conduits enable better triggers of Rift Towers.
Introduction of nano-engineered palladio-tanzanite alloys enable greater capacities and lethality of Rift Towers.
Advanced drone tower that can be equipped with various drone types.
Higher density powerplants and advanced metallurgies allow creation of Advanced Drone Towers. Each upgrade allow usage of new type of drone respectively.
In-situ assemblers and automatic maintenance systems enable better drone sustainment of Advanced Drone Towers.
Redesigned command protocols and drone design lead to greater lethality of Advanced Drone Towers.
Repurposed Seismic Lab that supplies Crystal Towers and weapons. Requires voidinite ore and radioactive gas or morphium to function.
A burst-firing tower that shoots crystal shards in direct line of sight of the enemy.
Repurposed Artillery Tower that delivers reactive crystal payload to distant targets in a ballistic arc.
Special tower which fires self-assembling crystals in a short range. Further upgrade increases amount of delivered payloads.
Autonomous sentry turret armed with a reactive crystal weapon.
Long range cruise missile system that launches missiles with reactive crystal payloads.
Capacity Increase - Crystal Cruise Missile Towers
Investigation of Crystal Caverns ecology enable creation of Crystal Towers that shoot reactive shards which deals sonic damage and spawn temporary blockers on impact.
Greater incorporation of special crystalline resonant structures lead to greater efficiencies of Crystal Towers.
Introduction of special crystalline lattice interfaces and processors allow for highest possible performance of Crystal Towers.
Investigation into palladio-ferdonite alloys and minaturized Rift technologies allow creation of Orbital Strike Structures.
New quantum matrices and ferdonite plasma injection systems enable more stable Rift opening for larger energy and mass transfers for Orbital Strike Towers.
Novel lattice alloys and redesigned Rift teleporter systems allow increase of frequency and acceleration of teleported payloads of Orbital Strike Towers.
Advanced structure that uses ferdonite plasma to open a Rift Portal and direct high energy laser beams toward the target.
Special structure that utilizes ferdonite plasma to open up multiple rift portals and rain barrage of high explosives shells directly on target.
Specialized factory manufacturing plasma munitions for Advanced Energy Towers and Mr.Riggs. Requires rhodonite condensate to operate.
A converted Acid Spitter Tower that shoots volatile antimatter spheres. Requires supercoolant to operate.
Super-sized plasma laser tower with big range and damage. Requires supercoolant to operate.
A heavily upgraded version of Railgun Tower with more range and penetration. Requires supercoolant to operate.
Plasma projector structure capable of launching coherent plasma at long ranges. Requires supercoolant to operate
Capacity Increase - Plasma Cruise Missile Towers
Creation of compact transportable energy sources enable second generation of Advanced Energy Towers. Each upgrade increases their rate of fire.
Incorporation of novel palladio-rhodonite composite alloys boost energy damage output of Advanced Energy Towers II.
Newer rhodonite power lenses and energy distribution systems further improve overall efficiencies of Advanced Energy Towers II.
Special structure that fires a slow-moving antimatter sphere which zaps everything in its path. The sphere self-detonates after some time or after colliding with the world.
Research into Lesigian aliens and palladio-rhodonite alloys lead to development of special Antimatter Towers.
Revised plasma conduits and incorporation of safeguard diverters allow damage enhancement of Antimatter Towers.
Introduction of better fusion source and nano-engineered energy metamaterials enable greatest potential of Antimatter Towers.
A redesigned Gatling Laser Tower capable of delivering barrage of atomic shells at distant targets.
Further development of Gatling Laser and Heavy Artillery Towers enable creation of Burst Heavy Artillery Tower, a rotary version of Heavy Artillery Towers.
Re-engineered supercharged plasma conduits and superstructure construction allow faster firing rate of Burst Heavy Artillery Towers.
Substitution of current construction with special metamaterials and more powerful superheated plasma injectors lead to highest possible damage of Burst Heavy Artillery Towers.
Special factory that produces acid munitions for Acid Towers and Mr.Riggs equipment. Requires sludge to operate.
Specialized blaster tower that is capable of sustained barrage of highly acidic projectiles.
Long range artillery firing highly corrosive shells.
Modified Acid Spitter tower that lobs acid-spewing grenades at detected targets.
Long range missile tower armed with long range acidic cruise missiles.
Capacity Increase - Acid Cruise Missile Towers
Research into Galatea 37 acidic biome creatures lead to analogues in form of Acid Towers. The towers have slightly bigger splash than others in their class.
Reformulation of weaponised acidic fluids enable higher damage output of Acid Towers.
Incorporation of nano-engineered palladium-rhodonite alloys enable more effective acid delivery on target for Acid Towers.
Special factory that produces cryo munitions for Cryo Towers and Mr.Riggs. Requires supercoolant to function.
Special blaster tower firing bursts of cryo energies on direct line of sight.
Long range artillery that fires special cryogenic shells in a ballistic arc.
Variant of Laser Tower equipped with condensate cooling laser. The tower needs to recharge for each firing cycle.
Long range missile launcher armed with powerful cryogenic payloads.
Capacity Increase - Cryo Cruise Missile Towers
Expansive investigation into cryoplants found in volcanic biome allow creation of Cryo Towers that can slowdown and kill their enemies.
Advancement in cobalt-ferdonite matter condensate engineering enable greater efficiencies of Cryo Towers.
Greater understanding in ferdonite matter condensate kinematics boost damage output of Cryo Towers.
Special factory that produces magma munitions for Magma Towers and Mr.Riggs. Requires magma to operate.
Blaster tower that shoots concentrated thermal energy in a shallow ballistic arc.
Long range artillery capable of delivering thermal shells to distant targets.
Converted Magma Blaster made to fire special encapsulated thermal energies in short ballistic arc.
Long range cruise missile launcher armed with devastating thermal warheads.
Capacity Increase - Magma Cruise Missile Towers
Research into Galatea 37's volcanic biome creatures allow creation of Magma Towers that harness intense thermal energies. Each upgrade increases amount of shot projectiles from Magma Towers.
Introduction of new titano-ferdonite alloy hybrids allow greater damage output of Magma Towers.
Newer molten magma encapsulation technologies and high temperature electronics further increase performance of Magma Towers.
Special factory that produces radioactive munitions for Radio Towers and Mr.Riggs. Requires tanzanite vapor to operate.
Special triple burst tower that deliver clusters of unstable radioactive plasma to target.
Two-round burst grenadier tower that launches radioactive plasma grenades at long ranges.
Variant of Minigun Tower that fires highly penetrating radioactive plasma projectiles in short bursts.
Long range missile launcher armed with nuclear missiles.
Capacity Increase - Radio Cruise Missile Towers

Further development of energy towers and nuclear technologies lead to creation of Radio Towers which shoots radioactive plasma that deal high damage to organic targets. Each upgrade increases their refire rate.
Creation of newer magnetic confinement geometries enable more consistent performance of Radio Towers.
Redesigned urano-tanzanite charge primers allow higher density ammunition and thus damage output of Radio Towers.
Special factory that produces gravity munitions for Gravity Towers and Mr.Riggs. Requires ferdonite plasma to operate.
Custom Blaster Tower engineered to fire bursts of hard-hitting graviton energies.
Special gravitic emitter that project coherent beam of gravitons.
Modified Portal Bomb Tower capable of delivering singularities on top of distant targets. Requires supercharged plasma to operate.
Research into ferdonite and advanced propulsions enable creation of Gravity Towers that harness singularities which deal tremendous damage to large targets.
Redesigned gravity induction components allow tremendous damage boost to Gravity Towers.
Utilization of new ferdonite compounds such as tetra palladio-ferdonite enable highest performance of Gravity Towers.
In Expanded Arsenal mod, Heavy Blasters can be charged twice and each charge mode is unique. Each Heavy Blaster have their own unique charge attacks.

In Expanded Arsenal mod, Crystal weapons <img="gui/menu/inventory/stat_icons/sonic_damage_icon"> are effective versus certain heavy creatures, Radiation weapons <img="gui/menu/inventory/stat_icons/radiation_damage_icon"> are effective against organic creatures and Gravity weapons <img="gui/menu/inventory/stat_icons/gravity_damage_icon"> are powerful against massive aliens.

In Expanded Arsenal mod, Crystal weapons <img="gui/menu/inventory/stat_icons/sonic_damage_icon"> inflict zero damage against metallic aliens and Radiation weapons <img="gui/menu/inventory/stat_icons/radiation_damage_icon"> are useless against most inorganic creatures while Gravity weapons <img="gui/menu/inventory/stat_icons/gravity_damage_icon"> deal massively reduced damage against flying aliens.
In Expanded Arsenal mod, Crystal Towers and Weapons can spawn temporary blockers on projectile impact that self-detonate after some time. These blockers do not block Mr. Riggs.
In Expanded Arsenal mod, there are special alien strains that can disable and, hack into player structures.
Investigate the appearance of unusually large creatures.
Eliminate threats to the activated Rift Station!
